title: NO face masks ONLY if immunization target is reached
content: Director-General of Health Services, Dr. Asela Gunawardena said the directive to stop wearing the face mask would be considered as the final decision regarding the easing of existing COVID-19 restrictions. Before removing the mask people should get the booster Jab, the target group is 14.1 million Sri Lankans, he said. Furthermore, he stated that giving the Booster dose to 14.1 million people would confirm that people have some form of immunity against COVID-19.
